verses.verse: So I am a strong witness in the sight of God and the Master Jesus, the Anointed King (the One who is going to be judging living people and dead people) regarding His manifestation and His empire.
Speak publicly about the message. Take a stand at easy times, at inconvenient times. Reprimand. Forbid. Encourage in every bit of patience and teaching.

You see, there will be a time when they will not tolerate the instruction that is healthy, but in line with the desires (their own), they will pile up teachers for themselves who tickle the hearing of the ear.
And away from the truth they certainly will turn the hearing of the ear; over the myths they will be turned out.
You must be sober in all things. Suffer tough hardships. Do the work of a sharer of good news. Be well-established in your job of serving.
You see, my blood is already being poured out as an offering, and the time of my release has stood over me.
I have struggled in the struggle, the nice one. I have finished the race. I have kept the trust.

For the rest of the time, the award wreath of the right way is set aside for me that the Master (the judge who does what is right) will give back to me in that day, not only to me, but also to all the people who have loved His manifestation.
Make every effort to come to me soon.
You see, Demas left me down in here (who loved the present span of time) and traveled to Thessalonica, Crescens to Galatia, Titus to Dalmatia.
Only Luke is with me. After taking up Mark, lead him here with yourself. You see, he is very useful to me in serving.
I sent Tychicus out on a mission to Ephesus.
Bring the coat that I left behind in Troas beside Carpus as you come, and the scrolls, especially the sheep skins.
Alexander, the coppersmith, displayed many bad things to me. The Master will give back to him in line with his actions,
whom you also must beware of. You see, he has stood very much in opposition to our messages.
In my first defense, no one came out together for me. But everyone left me down in here. May it not be considered to them.
The Master stood by me and gave ability to me so that through me the public speaking might be well-established and all the non-Jews might hear. And I was saved from the lion's mouth.
And the Master will save me from every evil action and will rescue me into His empire, the heavenly one, to whom belongs the magnificence for the spans of time of the spans of time. Amen.
Say hello to Prisca (the formal name of Priscilla), Aquila, and the people in Onesiphorus' house.
Erastus stayed in Corinth, but I left Trophimus behind in Miletus (who is weak).
Make every effort to come before the storm season. Eubulus, Pudens, Linus, Claudia, and all the brothers say hello to you.

May the Master Jesus, the Anointed King, be with your spirit, the generosity with you all. Amen. [This second letter was written to Timothy (first elected supervisor of the assembly of the Ephesian people) from Rome when Paul stood before Caesar Nero at the second time]
